page.title: 06INDUSTRY IN PARR.
page.content: Industry is predominantly light engineering and manufacturing in nature, the 19th century heavy industry having declined or moved from the area. Only one coalmine is still operating, Bold Colliery, and one glassworks, United Glass Bottleworks. Another glass works has recently closed with the loss of several hundred jobs. Two chemical works have also closed within the past five years, following complaints from residents living nearby. Although this may have been a contributary factor the cause of closure can also be attributed to the present economic climate in the country as a whole. There is also a coal fired Power Station at Bold, adjacent to Bold Colliery.
